page.title: 11 THE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {The Village Hall}was built in 1950 just after the Second World War.Then in{1964}it was bought for{Â£200}but now it is worth{Â£30,000.In the same year an extension was built.It is run by a {committee}which consist of{16}people who own it,and they don't get any financial help.The sort of activities that go on there are the{W.I,Brownies and{Guides,dancing,the doctors surgery etc.All the groups like this have to pay a rent,but if it's just something like a{party or a disco}you pay so much to hire.{The Village Hall}has a bar for the drinks a kitchen and a stage.They have to have a{licence}for all the{safety things}involved.Just lately a new extension was put on so they would have more room to store all the{youthclub}and{play group}things.
